document_data.mainbody:
maril Sweetwater was a half-elf and former adventurer whose travels eventually led her to Elventree. She liked the sylvan community so much that she decided to stay.
Amaril had a quick temper and took a long time to cool off once angered.
Amaril owned the Gold Caveâ€”a natural cave in Elventree that she converted into a general shop. As a former adventurer, she had a good idea of the equipment her former brethren required and kept her store stocked accordingly.
